explanation: The majority of actionable opinions point toward bullish momentum in BTC. Comments highlight large fund inflows ($14B buy, millions invested, expectations of breaking all-time highs), and several users discuss support holding, EMAs curling up, and the prevalence of retail shorts and negative funding rates (often a contrarian bullish signal). Some bearish (short) opinions exist, but they're outnumbered and often rebutted or questioned by others in the chat. The consensus leans strongly bullish, with a high confidence in further upside.
